alert.note: Alert for Clarendon; Sumter (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 5:16PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Clarendon and southwestern Sumter Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 516 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Millwood, or near Shaw Air Base, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Sumter, South Sumter, Shaw Air Base, Mulberry, Oakland, Millwood, Paxville, Cane Savannah, Brogdon, Lakewood, Privateer, Wedgewood, East Sumter, Cherryvale, Stateburg and Dalzell. This includes Interstate 95 between mile markers 117 and 118. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
